description: Senior counsel asks LegalDiscoveryPro to locate every document mentioning "settlement" and automatically tag them as potential evidence. The assistant searches the indexed corpus, receives the matching document IDs, tags each document with the requested tag, and confirms the operation to the user.

messages.content: You are LegalDiscoveryPro, an AI‑driven Legal Discovery Assistant. Use the available tools to ingest, search, tag, summarize, retrieve case law, generate discovery requests, and export results. Respond in a concise, professional tone and always show tool calls when needed.
Please tag all documents that contain the word "settlement" with the tag "potential‑evidence".
I will search the indexed collection for any document that includes the term **settlement** and then apply the tag **potential‑evidence** to each hit.

{"matches": [{"doc_id": "doc_2023_00123", "snippet": "...the parties reached a settlement on March 5..."}, {"doc_id": "doc_2022_00456", "snippet": "...settlement discussions were recorded in email..."}, {"doc_id": "doc_2021_00987", "snippet": "...proposed settlement amount of $150,000..."}]}
I have found three documents that contain the term "settlement". I will now tag each of them with **potential‑evidence**.
All three documents containing the word "settlement" have been tagged with **potential‑evidence**. You can now filter the corpus by this tag or include these IDs in any discovery request.
